apply.emailPrompt: Please enter your email to start the application process

apply.confirmation: Thank you for applying! Your application will be reviewed and you will be contacted shortly.
apply.approved: Your application has been approved continue to training

apply.errorConnection: Something went wrong check your internet connection

mentorApplication.introduction: We appreciate your interest in becoming a volunteer Global Mentor for MENTEE, a global nonprofit accelerating personal and professional growth to make the world a better, healthier place.
mentorApplication.filloutPrompt: Please fill out the application below
mentorApplication.submitError: Something went wrong -- check your email at the top
mentorApplication.hearAboutUs: From whom or where did you hear about us?
mentorApplication.knowledgeLocation: Please share which region(s), country(s), state(s), cities your knowledge is based in
mentorApplication.previousLocations: Where have you lived in your life besides where you live now?
mentorApplication.jobDescription: Your full title and a brief description of your role
mentorApplication.jobDuration: How long have you been with this company?
mentorApplication.commitDuration: If you are accepted as a global mentor, would you like to commit to...
mentorApplication.immigrationStatus: Are you an immigrant or refugee or do you come from an immigrant family or refugee family?
mentorApplication.communityStatus: Are you or your family from a native or aboriginal community?
mentorApplication.economicBackground: Did you grow up economically challenged?
mentorApplication.isPersonOfColor: Would you consider yourself of person of color
mentorApplication.isMarginalized: Would you define yourself as having been or currently marginalized
mentorApplication.languageBackground: Do you speak a language(s) other than English? If yes, please write the language(s) below and include your fluency level (conversational, fluent, native)
mentorApplication.referral: If you know someone who would be a great global mentor, please share their name, email, and we'll contact them!
mentorApplication.canDonate: MENTEE is a volunteer organization and we are sustained by donations. Are you able to offer a donation for one year?

menteeApplication.introduction: We appreciate your interest in becoming part of the MENTEE community! You will gain access to our global mentors and supportive programs. We can't wait to see all you will achieve. Remember, as a mentee you can stay here and actively seek mentorship, learning, and development for life, if you'd like to stay with us that long. :)
menteeApplication.submitError: Something went wrong -- check your email at the top
menteeApplication.orgAffiliation: What organization is supporting you locally or what organization are you affiliated with?
menteeApplication.agePrompt: Let us know more about you
menteeApplication.immigrationStatus: Let us know more about you. Check ALL of the boxes that apply. When filling out other, please be very specific.
menteeApplication.countryOrigin: What country are you or your family originally from, if you are a refugee or immigrant?
menteeApplication.topicInterests: What special topics would you be interested in? If one is not on the list please add it in other:
menteeApplication.workOptions: What do you currently do? Please check ALL the options that apply to you. If you select ''other'', please be specific:
menteeApplication.socialMedia: Would you be interested in being highlighted as one of our mentees on social media?

partnerApplication.introduction: We appreciate your interest in becoming a volunteer Global Partner for MENTEE, a global nonprofit accelerating personal and professional growth to make the world a better, healthier place.
partnerApplication.pointOfContact: Who is the best contact person?
partnerApplication.partnersConcerns: What SDGs does your organization/institution/company care about?
partnerApplication.buildTogether: How else do you think we could build together going forward?
partnerApplication.submitError: Something went wrong -- check your email at the top

mentorContactModal.basicInfoNotice: Your name and email will be sent to this mentor
mentorContactModal.communicationMethod: What is your preferred communication method?
mentorContactModal.introPrompt: Briefly introduce yourself and what you are looking to gain from a Mentor.
mentorContactModal.introExample: Hi Jim! I’m a junior at Oxford University studying Economics. I saw that you’re knowledgeable in Personal Finance, which is something I’m interested in, and I’d love to learn more about your experiences. Thank you for your time!
mentorContactModal.confirmationText: Your mentor will be getting back to you soon! Feel free to browse the mentor page and reach out to other mentors.
